content: this legal text summarizes the division of assets between three parties referred to as at ae and ag the assets include an apartment a warehouse two dwellings and a share of land the text specifies the cadastral data and values of each property ag is assigned an apartment and two shares of bare ownership of dwellings ae is assigned a warehouse and two shares of bare ownership of dwellings and at is assigned the right to life usufruct of two dwellings and a share of full ownership of land the values of the assigned properties are specified and the balance of the division is paid to at the text also mentions the registration of the properties and the urban planning regulations they comply with the parties declare the accuracy of the cadastral data and compliance with energy efficiency regulations the division of assets takes effect immediately and the costs of the division are shared equally among the parties ag declares that the assigned property will be used as a primary residence and requests the benefits provided for primary residences the text is signed by the parties and the notary
